message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your experience. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, we believe it is worth more than $12000 to us. Considering the value it brings, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you for $15000. This is an opportunity to acquire a high-end product at a competitive price. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of a lower price. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $12000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and my budget. Please let me know if this is something you're willing to consider.
